attributes.action: Let members of the internet clan "Wifi Warriors" onto computers, regardless of academic performance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many members of the famed "Wifi Warriors" website are being refused the time they crave for online socializing, due to narrow minded parents who stop children from going on the internet if their grades are not high enough. This is in contrary to the human rights act 1, section x, line  π, and must stop. This petition concerns residents of both the USA and UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
